content:
TimeSpanStyles Enum

Definition

Defines the formatting options that customize string parsing for the stem.TimeSpan.ParseExact* and stem.TimeSpan.TryParseExact* methods.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum TimeSpanStyles
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
TimeSpanStyles

Fields

AssumeNegative

Indicates that input is always interpreted as a negative time interval.
None

Indicates that input is interpreted as a negative time interval only if a negative sign is present.
